detaileddescription.para: Rationales: ComservCL component is intended to act as a data gateway to provide a fast routing between SOME/IP services and other comunication buses.(CAN,LIN,Ethernet).

Alternatives: ComservCL is an alternative of LdCom and Some/IP transformer components because these components can not cover all costumer requirements that are OEM specific and are not part of AUTOSAR specifications.
